mgci.jhdap.shogi

Class PromotedBishop

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PromotedBishop
extends UnpromotablePiece
    A Class representing a promoted bishop in a game of shogi.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PromotedBishop

        public PromotedBishop(int x,
              int y,
              int allegiance)
        Constructs a promoted bishop at a given x and y-value, with the given allegiance.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value at which this promoted bishop is located.
        y - The y-value at which this promoted bishop is located.
        allegiance - The allegiance of this promoted bishop.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidNonDropMove

        protected boolean isValidNonDropMove(GameState state,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Checks whether this PromotedBishop can move to a given location.
        Specified by:
        isValidNonDropMove in class UnpromotablePiece
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the game at this time.
        x - The x-value of the target tile.
        y - The y-value of the target tile.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this PromotedBishop can move to the target tile.

      • demote

        protected Piece demote()
        Returns the piece this promoted bishop demotes to. In this case, this is a bishop with the same x and y values, and the same allegiance.
        Specified by:
        demote in class UnpromotablePiece
        Returns:
        The bishop equivalent of this promoted bishop.
